name: Scuba
headline: Analytics for impatient people.
description: Scuba is the fast and scalable event-based analytics solution to answer critical business questions about how customers behave and products are used. Interana allows users to analyze and explore the key business metrics that matter most in a data-driven world – such as growth, retention, conversion and engagement – in seconds, rather than the hours or days it often takes with existing solutions. Interana allows customers to discover and investigate these key insights easily through its visual and interactive interface, which makes data analysis a natural extension of everyone’s workflow.

founders.name: Lior Abraham, Founder
founders.description: Facebook engineer. Built first real time newsfeed. Scuba internal app. Scuba Analytics as a companh

#  Can your BI keep up with AI? 
####  The Human in the Loop BI Platform for Business AI. 
[ Talk to a Human Expert ](https://www.scuba.io/<https:/www.scuba.io/schedule-a-demo/>)
![salesforce-with-type-logo](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/salesforce-with-type-logo.png)
![596f4c7c](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/596f4c7c.png)
![Microsoft-Logo-Transparent-Background](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Microsoft-Logo-Transparent-Background.png)
![svgviewer-png-output](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/svgviewer-png-output.png)
![trulieve_logo_green](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/trulieve_logo_green.webp)
![VGW-Logo-300x89](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/VGW-Logo-300x89-1.webp)
![recurrent](http://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/recurrent-1.png)
![Comcast-Logo](http://ec2-44-221-50-58.compute-1.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Comcast-Logo.png)
##  Employing a Digital Workforce Requires Human Reasoning
###  Connect AI + BI for Seamless AI Agent and Customer Experiences with Human in the Loop Intelligence
###  Future-proof your AI investments. Observe, Measure and Optimize your digital workforce with real-time decision intelligence.
### Insights
Continuous dynamic insights across all touch points and AI agent interactions 
### Measurement
Real-time measurement and performance of your digital workforce across all channels 
### Privacy
Privacy Enhancing Technology for global regulations and customer trust
[ Talk to a Human Expert ](https://www.scuba.io/<https:/www.scuba.io/schedule-a-demo/>)
##  The Human in the Loop BI Platform for Business AI
![SCUBA Time-Series Data Warehouse for AI Analytics_3](https://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SCUBA-Time-Series-Data-Warehouse-for-AI-Analytics_3.png)
[ INSIGHTS ](https://www.scuba.io/<#insights>)
[ MEASUREMENT ](https://www.scuba.io/<#measurement>)
[ PRIVACY ](https://www.scuba.io/<#governance>)
[ PRODUCT OVERVIEW ](https://www.scuba.io/<#product-overview>)
![1d708b763afb45f2660c5b6f257e2450ece310219ec5a1097b7003bc4baefefd](https://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/1d708b763afb45f2660c5b6f257e2450ece310219ec5a1097b7003bc4baefefd.png)
#####  Insights
##  Real-time BI for AI 
SCUBA's human-in-the-loop intelligence delivers holistic visibility across all customer and agent interactions to deliver performance driven business outcomes.
**Contextual Insights:** Democratize agent and customer intelligence for business stakeholders without programming or data engineering
**Behavioral AI:** Understand behaviors across all touch points dynamically to ensure your digital workforce is performing and delivering 
**Signals Intelligence** : Real-time insights delivered into Slack, Tableau or your custom application without writing queries or data engineering
#####  Measurement
##  Digital Workforce Management
Continuous customer and agent decision intelligence for customer obsessed teams. No data engineering required.
**Accelerate Agent Monetization:** Continuous agent journey insights to ensure dynamic customer experiences, conversions and retention
**Performance Management:** Measure and monitor your AI investments across all channels in real-time
**Agent Transparency** : Continuous agent intelligence and monitoring across every touchpoint
![image \(1\)](https://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/image-1.png)
![e030ea9192d56b6135b308e6e4d9c8e874a1cd3318a046c99a7efeb3ea6844d2](https://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/e030ea9192d56b6135b308e6e4d9c8e874a1cd3318a046c99a7efeb3ea6844d2.png)
#####  Governance
##  Privacy Enhancing Technology (PETs)
Embedded privacy preserving technology to maintain customer trust and comply with global privacy regulations.
**Secure PII:** Automated anonymization without compromising insights or privacy
**100% Data Control & Residency:** Deploy in your cloud or region to ensure comprehensive data control and sovereignty
**Agent Audit & Reporting:** Maintain full visibility of all interactions with unified reporting of all data interactions
[ Talk to a Human Expert ](https://www.scuba.io/<https:/www.scuba.io/schedule-a-demo/>)
###  PRODUCT OVERVIEW
##  Human in the Loop BI Platform for Business AI
### Bridge the gap between autonomous agents and human reasoning for real-time decision intelligence. Empower marketing, customer service, product and data sciences teams to gain insights into every customer interaction.
![Decision Intelligence Desktop SCUBA Board](https://www.scuba.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Decision-Intelligence-Desktop-SCUBA-Board.png)
###  Continuous Agent Intelligence
Analyze, Monitor and Measure agent behaviors to optimize experiences using our intuitive visual interface to iterate, solve problems, and answer questions in-the-moment without coding.
###  Power your BI or Application with SCUBA
Leverage our API to process distributed agent events and pull them into Tableau or custom applications without complex data engineering.
###  Automated Signals 
Stop staring at dashboards. Deliver actionable signals dynamically to Slack, Teams, Email or custom applications without complexity.
###  Human Reasoning Loop
Human in the Loop intelligence to optimize autonomous agent and monitor how they are interacting with your customers. Apply human reasoning to manage your digital workforce at scale.
[ Talk to a Human Expert ](https://www.scuba.io/<https:/www.scuba.io/schedule-a-demo/>)
##  Seize Every Opportunity with Precision
### +0T
####  Real-Time Data Points
### +0M
####  Dynamic Customer Interactions
### +0
####  Active SCUBA Users
### +0B
####  Insights and Predictions
#####  POWERFUL SOLUTIONS
##  Proven Success
“One of the reasons Bleacher Report has such a successful track record in terms of high engagement rates and low churn rates is because SCUBA makes it possible for us to know so much about our users and their interactions with our content and app. We have a truly unparalleled degree of visibility and insight.”
[ See more customer success stories ](https://www.scuba.io/<https:/4314033.hs-sites.com/resources?__hstc=109822426.ac662d7dcadcffe28634afc505589e4e.1707095475456.1707110687348.1707116968975.4&__hssc=109822426.103.1707116968975&__hsfp=2770892868>)
![Bleacher Report Case Study](http://ec2-44-221-50-58.compute-1.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Screenshot-2024-05-19-at-6.36.33 AM-300x273.png)

  * [Use Cases](https://www.scuba.io/</solutions>)
  * [About](https://www.scuba.io/<https:/www.scuba.io/about/>)

generated_description:
**Scuba: The Analytics Solution for the Impatient**

Founded in 2013 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W13, Scuba has established itself as a innovative force in the field of analytics. The company operates under the clear mission of providing "Analytics for impatient people," making it a go-to solution for rapid data analysis that answers pressing business questions around customer behavior and product usage.

Scuba’s flagship product, Interana, is a fast and scalable event-based analytics platform that enables users to dig deep into critical metrics—like growth, retention, and engagement—in a matter of seconds. Unlike traditional analytics tools that leave users grappling for insights for hours or days, Interana’s intuitive and interactive interface integrates seamlessly into everyday workflows, democratizing data access and enhancing decision-making.

Located in the heart of the tech world, Scuba boasts a team of 51 dedicated employees and has partnered with notable groups to further its reach. With its offerings tagged under ‘analytics’, ‘big data’, ‘data engineering’, and ‘data visualization’, Scuba ensures it meets diverse customer needs in a data-driven landscape.

### What Scuba Offers:

1. **Real-Time Insights**: Flows of data are analyzed in real-time, allowing businesses to react swiftly to changes and opportunities as they arise.
   
2. **Human in the Loop**: Scuba bridges the gap between autonomous AI agents and human reasoning, allowing businesses to decode customer interactions efficiently.

3. **Privacy Enhancements**: The platform includes built-in privacy technology to meet global regulations, maintaining customer trust while delivering actionable insights.

4. **Automation and Integration**: Scuba can deliver signals directly to tools like Slack or Tableau without necessitating intricate data engineering, making daily operations smoother and more efficient.

### A Glance at Success:

Clients, like the Bleacher Report, have heralded Scuba for its transformative impact on user engagement and churn rates. With testimonials highlighting unparalleled visibility into user interactions, it's clear that Scuba doesn’t just facilitate analytics; it empowers businesses to cultivate meaningful relationships with their customers.

**Ready to dive into analytics?** Visit [Scuba's website](https://www.scuba.io) to learn more or schedule a demo today. With Scuba, impatience becomes a competitive advantage.
